item.title: Victim-Blaming in the Fatal Minnesota Shooting
item.description: After an ICE agent fatally shot a woman in Minnesota, responses have ranged from compassion for the victim to extreme criticism and unsubstantiated attacks. How can we address such victim-blaming?

item.title: Man charged after being shot by Richmond police at GRTC headquarters

item.title: Venezuelan shot in another federal agent action in U.S. Minneapolis
